verses.verse: Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5399>fear,<s%> <S%G3379>lest,<s%> a <S%G1860>promise<s%> being <S%G2641>left<s%> us of <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of you should <S%G1380>seem<s%> to <S%G5302>come<s%> <S%G5302>short<s%> of it.

For to us was the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G2097>preached,<s%> as <S%G2509>well<s%> as to them: but the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G189>preached<s%> did not <S%G5623>profit<s%> them, not being <S%G4786>mixed<s%> with <S%G4102>faith<s%> in them that <S%G191>heard<s%> it.

For we <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G4100>believed<s%> do <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2663>rest,<s%> as he <S%G2046>said,<s%> As I have <S%G3660>sworn<s%> in my <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they shall <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G2663>rest:<s%> <S%G2543>although<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> were <S%G1096>finished<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For he <S%G2046>spoke<s%> in a <S%G4225>certain<s%> place of the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> day on <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>wise,<s%> And <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G2664>rest<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G2041>works.<s%>
And in <S%G5129>this<s%> place <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> they shall <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G2663>rest.<s%>

<S%G1893>Seeing<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it <S%G620>remains<s%> that <S%G5100>some<s%> must <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> and they to whom it was <S%G4386>first<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> not in <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G543>unbelief:<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> he <S%G3724>limits<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in <S%G1138>David,<s%> To <S%G4594>day,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>long<s%> a <S%G5550>time;<s%> as it is <S%G2046>said,<s%> To <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you will <S%G191>hear<s%> his <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G4645>harden<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had given them <S%G2664>rest,<s%> then would he not <S%G3326>afterward<s%> <S%G5023><s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

For he that is <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2663>rest,<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G2664>ceased<s%> from his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> did from his.

Let us <S%G4704>labor<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1722>after<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5262>example<s%> of <S%G543>unbelief.<s%>

For the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2198>quick,<s%> and <S%G1756>powerful,<s%> and <S%G5114>sharper<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> two <S%G1366>edged<s%> <S%G3162>sword,<s%> <S%G1338>piercing<s%> even to the <S%G3311>dividing<s%> asunder of <S%G5590>soul<s%> and <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and of the <S%G719>joints<s%> and <S%G3452>marrow,<s%> and is a <S%G2924>discerner<s%> of the <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> and <S%G1771>intents<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

<S%G2532>Neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> is there any <S%G2937>creature<s%> that is not <S%G852>manifest<s%> in his <S%G1799>sight:<s%> but <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G1131>naked<s%> and <S%G5136>opened<s%> to the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of him with <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have to <S%G3588>do.<s%> <S%G3056><s%>

Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> that is <S%G1330>passed<s%> into the <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> let us <S%G2902>hold<s%> fast our <S%G3671>profession.<s%>

For we <S%G2192>have<s%> not an <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> which <S%G3361>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> be <S%G4834>touched<s%> with the <S%G4834>feeling<s%> of our <S%G769>infirmities;<s%> but was in <S%G3956>all<s%> points <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G2596>like<s%> <S%G3665><s%> as we are, yet <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4334>come<s%> <S%G3954>boldly<s%> to the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G5485>grace,<s%> that we may <S%G2983>obtain<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to <S%G996>help<s%> in <S%G2121>time<s%> of <S%G2121>need.<s%>
